extendedInfo.description: Dear friends! We offer a unique game product - "Happy Pet!"In this game you will be able to fully realize yourselves as a good pet owner. First, select a pet and give it a name. After this the game will start. From time to time the pet will require you to do a certain action, such as to feed it or clean after it. In no case, do not ignore its requests, as this depends on the rate of  the development of your pet. If it is hungry -  feed it, if it is bored - play with it. Don't just leave your pet unattended, and then it will reward you fully for your efforts."Happy Pet for Android is a very interesting and lovely pet virtual game - AppEggs.com"The game is based on the principle of the classic Tamagotchi (ãã¾ãã£ã¡ tamagotti).

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Awasome very cute game yayyayy now I have somthing to take care of and this never ever dies so I have I a pet forever yayyayaay now there\'s a game just like this
reviews.author: Jeana Stewart

reviews.title: Excellent, very good.
reviews.comment: I really enjoy playing this on my Samsung Galaxy Mini (S5570)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App.....
reviews.comment: I would RATE this Game 5 stars but........We can\'t really INTERACT with our Pet...It would be Nice if we could get some sort of NOTIFICATION of our Pet needing something....Its boring to just sit here and Wait for the Pet to Want or Need. This is where More INTERACTION with our Pets would come in..This is the only thing I can really say I have any problem with...Other than this I got NO PROBLEMS WHAT SO EVER...
reviews.author: Virginia Gonzalez

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: Why can\'t you keep the stuff you purchase so you can switch back and forth with things? And why is there not other options to play with your dog even if the bar is full? A real pet owner can play with their pets whenever and can switch back and forth through things they buy it.. it is two stars cause my son likes seeing the dog or I would delete it. I still might and find him one that\'s more interactive.
reviews.author: Kathleen Madsen

reviews.title: Cute!
reviews.comment: I think this game is adorable! I love it. I\'m only giving it 4 stars though because I wish I could play with my pet even when her bar is full. There\'s not much you can do and it takes a long time to get money, it\'s expensive for the little things. It\'s cute just a tad boring when everything is full and you can\'t do anything else with the pet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Updates
reviews.comment: Very fun game!  It reminds me of when I was a kid, and now my kid loves this version... only reason for 4 stars is because you can\'t keep the items you buy, so there\'s no switching back and forth...other than that... cute!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Found out the hard way...
reviews.comment: I saved and saved for a background, bought a new one, switched to another, then found out I had to repurchase the one I had been saving for!!! Not cool. Also, it takes WAY too long for my pet to catch up on his sleep; and no matter what I do, he never gets a liveliness of 10. Would be 5 stars if those two issues weren\'t so incredibly frustrating!! Oh, and we should most definitely be able to EARN crystals.
reviews.author: Ashley MacKenzie

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: This game is veryy boring. Needs to have way more stuff to do with your pet to earn coins. Also needs much more stuff to buy like decorations and collars and other cute stuff for your pet like other games have.
reviews.author: A Google User
